description: Glance supports settings custom properties, but these are then not retrievable through the EC2 API (that I can see).  I think the natural way to expose them is through the tagSet collection of DescribeImagesResponseItemType.
title: EC2 API: DescribeImages does not return custom properties

comments.content: Glance supports settings custom properties, but these are then not retrievable through the EC2 API (that I can see).  I think the natural way to expose them is through the tagSet collection of DescribeImagesResponseItemType.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~justin-fathomdb
